    • setTable

      public void setTable​(int[][] table, String[] family_names)
      Description copied from class: AnnotatedTable
      Sets the table from externally constructed data.
      Overrides:
      setTable in class AnnotatedTable
      Parameters:
      table - family sizes: table[i][j] is the size of the i-th family in the j-th species (this latter indexed as in terminal_taxa)
      family_names - names for the families in the order of the indexes into the int[] array; if null, then they are set to are set to "F1,F2,..."
